description:
At the law firm of Scura, Wigfield, Heyer, Stevens & Cammarota, LLP, in Hackensack, New Jersey, we provide dedicated bankruptcy representation. Helping businesses and individuals to achieve a fresh financial start, we proudly serve clients in the Hackensack area, as well as in Hoboken, Newark and Wayne, and throughout Bergen and Passaic counties. For the convenience of those we represent, our firm accepts credit cards.

We know sometimes good people find themselves struggling with overwhelming debt. Our relationship with our clients begins with a free initial consultation, during which we listen to and offer judgment-free counsel. Our attorneys explain people's options for eliminating their debts or reorganizing their credit payments, and we guide them through the process of filing for Chapter 7, Chapter 11 or Chapter 13 bankruptcy.

As our clients' advocates, we strive to level the legal playing field for them. While we place an emphasis on offering our clients big-firm experience and resources, it is our goal to create a comfortable atmosphere in which we can work together with those to achieve their legal objectives. Our law firm communicates regularly with our clients throughout the process, working to ensure they are prepared to make informed decisions about their cases and their futures.

In addition to representing clients in bankruptcy filings, our team at Scura, Wigfield, Heyer, Stevens & Cammarota, LLP, aids clients with a range of other legal issues. Our law firm also handles personal injury, employment law, corporate transaction law, estate planning and administration, elder law and Medicaid planning, and real estate law matters.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the U.S. Bankruptcy Code.
